text: Deborah "Debbie" Lee Carrington (December 14, 1959 - March 24, 2018) was an American actress and stuntwoman. She was born in San Jose, California. She suffered from dwarfism. She was known as being a stunt-double for Chucky.Debbie Lee Carrington Biography (1959-) Carrington appeared in many movies and TV shows, including In Living Color, The Drew Carey Show, Return of the Jedi, Howard the Duck, Total Recall, Men in Black, Seinfeld, Baywatch, Married... with Children (1990), Boston Legal, The Garbage Pail Kids Movie, Dexter and Bones. Carrington died on March 24, 2018 in Pleasanton, California at the age of 58.Actress and Stuntwoman Debbie Lee Carrington Has Passed Away ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1959 births Category:2018 deaths Category:People with dwarfism Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Stunt performers Category:Actors from San Jose, California Category:Actors from Santa Clara County, California
title: Debbie Lee Carrington
